Home Gallery Slideshow Medical Tower for the Family aware that health is a priority, for this reason we cordially invite citizens in general to receive our preventive packages at prices within everyone\'s reach. We have excellent Specialists in different areas, with ethics and human quality that is the most important thing.
We are located on Rocafuerte street between Colon and Buenavista, diagonal to the Coop. Santa Rosa Savings and Credit.
